TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawingAttributes extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 指定 的外觀

span.span: Specifies the appearance of a

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定設定，例如色彩、 寬度、 透明度及手寫筆筆尖的形狀。Use the property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a . 使用屬性來指定所加入的筆劃的繪圖屬性。Use the property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an . 唯一的筆劃後加入進行變更顯示更新的屬性。Only strokes that are added after the undergo change show the updated attributes. 已在筆劃的外觀不會變更。The appearance of the strokes that are already on the does not change. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 這個類別不通常用於 XAML。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用兩個物件來模擬在同一個使用畫筆與螢光筆。The following example demonstrates how to use two objects to simulate using a pen and a highlighter on the same . 此範例假設為 XAML 檔案中的根項目稱為`root`。The example assumes the root element in the XAML file is a called `root`. 同時也假設有名`switchHighlighter`而且事件已連線到此範例中定義的事件處理常式。It also assumes that there is a called `switchHighlighter` and that the event is connected to the event handler defined in this example. summary.span: 將自訂屬性加入至 物件。

span.span: Adds a custom property to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您新增自訂屬性加入物件。The method enables you to add custom properties to a object. 當您轉譯您自己的筆劃，並想要提供額外的資訊時，這非常有用。This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何新增和擷取自訂屬性從物件。The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the object. 範例會將此屬性，指出是否物件是畫筆或螢光筆。The example adds a property that indicates whether the object is a pen or a highlighter. 中的程式碼`ChangeColors_Click`事件處理常式上轉譯筆劃的新色彩使用物件， `inkDA`。The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the that use the object, `inkDA`. 這個範例假設有名為`inkCanvas1`，並有兩個命名的物件`inkDA`，及 `highlighterDA.`This example assumes that there is an named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.` [!code-csharp[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來繪製 的手寫筆高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the stylus used to draw the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列因素會影響的高度和寬度呈現時，但不是是值屬性。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 套用至手寫筆的壓力總量時繪製。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 屬性的值。The value of the property. 如果您將設定屬性至 0 裝置獨立像素 (DIP)，其變更為 2 的 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 這個屬性通常不使用 XAML 中。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 這個範例假設您的應用程式具有名`inkCanvas1`，並將兩個稱為物件`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 完整的範例，請參閱類別概觀。For the complete example, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列因素會影響的高度和寬度呈現時，但不是是值屬性。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 套用至手寫筆的壓力總量時繪製。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 屬性的值。The value of the property. 如果您將設定屬性至 0 裝置獨立像素 (DIP)，其變更為 2 的 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 這個屬性通常不使用 XAML 中。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 這個範例假設您的應用程式具有名`inkCanvas1`，並將兩個稱為物件`inkDA`和`highlighterDA`。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 完整的範例，請參閱類別概觀。For the complete example, see the class overview.
